title: Merson Says: Man Utd must get Rice | How would he fit at Old Trafford?
shortDescription: Paul Merson thinks Declan Rice will leave West Ham this summer and says Manchester United have "got to break the bank" to get the midfielder.

title: Liverpool confident of signing Carvalho in summer

title: Rangnick: Lingard asked for time off | Jesse: My headspace is clear
shortDescription: Jesse Lingard insists his "headspace is clear" after Ralf Rangnick said the forward asked Manchester United to take some time off to "clear up his mind".

Manchester City booked their place in the Continental League Cup final against

title: Bruce appointed West Brom boss | 'Promotion my only aim'
